messages.title: This time we can do things differently
messages.content: Because we can't afford five more years of this... After thirteen years in power, there's no room for more excuses from Labour. From violent crime to cuts in the NHS to MPs' expenses, Gordon Brown and Labour have failed us.

messages.title: Real change for Britain
messages.content: The sad truth is that sixty-five years of Labour and the Conservatives taking it in turns to run the country hasn't worked. But now Britain can have real change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will get our economy moving. No tax on the first £10,000 you earn. Cut Government waste to protect vital services and pay back debt.
The Lib Dems will clean up politics. Give the people power to sack corrupt MPs. Ban big donations from politics and give power back to local communities.
The Lib Dems will protect public services. 3000 more police to keep our streets safe. Invest £2.5 billion in our schools. A guarantee to protect vital NHS services.

mentions.candidate: Nick Clegg now in contention as potential PM
mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Britain... It's a two horse race. In many areas, the Conservatives are in a distant third place and cannot win. ONLY THE LIB DEMS OR LABOUR CAN WIN

issues.economy: No tax on the first £10,000 you earn. Cut Government waste to protect vital services and pay back debt.
issues.governance: Give the people power to sack corrupt MPs. Ban big donations from politics and give power back to local communities.
issues.health: A guarantee to protect vital NHS services.

quotes.text: Historic poll puts Lib Dems IN FRONT for first time in 104 years
Liberal Democrats ahead of Labour in new poll

images.caption: Nick Clegg with supporters and discussing with individuals, highlighting 'Real change for Britain'.
